column4: hello, anyone familiar with openCV? i have problem to run this code in linux:   cvCreateTrackbar( "Position", "Video2",  &g_slider_position, frameCount, onTrackbarSlide); but the same code is fine in windows. the error is : OpenCV Error: One of arguments' values is out of range (Bad trackbar maximal value)
That's offtopic for this channel.  You may try #ubuntu-offtopic, but youll have more luck in the appropriate OpenCV channel
